Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.rule

package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.rule
Use Signal annotations to declare conditions and Effect to link these conditions to an effect.

    Description
    org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog
    This package offers a default implementation of a Node Dialog as described in org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.
